description: Download and install Intel MKL(Math Kernel Library) on selected nodes.

description.2018: Intel MKL 2018 will be installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.0.128/linux/mkl on the nodes.
description.2018 Update 1: Intel MKL 2018 Update 1 will be installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl on the nodes.
description.2018 Update 2: Intel MKL 2018 Update 2 will be installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/mkl on the nodes.
description.2018 Update 3: Intel MKL 2018 Update 3 will be installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/mkl on the nodes.
description.2018 Update 4: Intel MKL 2018 Update 4 will be installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mkl on the nodes.
description.2019: Intel MKL 2019 will be installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2019.0.117/linux/mkl on the nodes.

parameters.name: Max runtime
parameters.description: Specify the max time in seconds the test could run.
